A

AdapterListener - Interface in de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter
Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified, when the underlying data of a PreferenceHeaderAdapter has been changed, must implement.
addAllItems(Collection<PreferenceHeader>) - Method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter.PreferenceHeaderAdapter
Adds all preference headers, which are contained by a specific collection, to the adapter.
addAllPreferenceHeaders(Collection<PreferenceHeader>) - Method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceActivity
Adds all preference headers, which are contained by a specific collection, to the activity.
addDecorator(PreferenceHeaderDecorator) - Method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter.PreferenceHeaderAdapter
Adds a new decorator, which should be applied, when an item of the adapter is visualized, to the adapter.
addFragmentListener(FragmentListener) - Method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.fragment.PreferenceHeaderFragment
Adds a new listener, which should be notified on events concerning the fragment.
addItem(PreferenceHeader) - Method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter.PreferenceHeaderAdapter
Adds a new preference header to the adapter.
addListener(AdapterListener) - Method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.adapter.PreferenceHeaderAdapter
Adds a new listener, which should be notified, when the underlying data of the adapter has been changed, to the adapter.
addPreferenceHeader(PreferenceHeader) - Method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceActivity
Adds a new preference header to the activity.
addPreferenceHeadersFromResource(int) - Method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceActivity
Adds all preference headers, which are specified by a specific XML resource, to the activity.
addRestoreDefaultsListener(RestoreDefaultsListener) - Method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceFragment
Adds a new listener, which should be notified, when the preferences' default values should be restored, to the fragment.
addWizardListener(WizardListener) - Method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceActivity
Adds a new listener, which should be notified, when the user navigates within the activity, if it is used as a wizard, to the activity.
areDisabledPreferencesRestored() - Method in class de.mrapp.android.preference.activity.PreferenceFragment
Returns, whether the default values of preferences, which are currently disabled, are also restored when clicking the appropriate button.
